summary.span: 在可滚动的网格中显示 ADO.NET 数据。

span.span: Displays ADO.NET data in a scrollable grid.

summary.span: 控件取代了 控件并添加了功能；但是，可以选择保留 控件以实现向后兼容并供将来使用。

span.span: The control replaces and adds functionality to the control; however, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示指向子表的类似 Web 的链接。The displays Web-like links to child tables. 您可以单击链接以导航到子表。You can click on a link to navigate to the child table. 显示某个子表后，可以单击该标题中的 "后退" 按钮以导航回到父表。When a child table is displayed, a back button appears in the caption that can be clicked to navigate back to the parent table. 父行中的数据显示在标题下方和列标题的上方。The data from the parent rows is displayed below the caption and above the column headers. 可以通过单击 "后退" 按钮右侧的按钮来隐藏父行信息。You can hide the parent row information by clicking the button to the right of the back button. 若要在运行时显示 中的表，请使用 方法将 和 属性设置为有效的数据源。To display a table in the at run time, use the method to set the and properties to a valid data source. 以下数据源有效：The following data sources are valid: - 一个 类型的值A - 一个 类型的值A - 一个 类型的值A - 一个 类型的值A - 单个维度数组A single dimension array - 实现 接口的任何组件Any component that implements the interface - 实现 接口的任何组件Any component that implements the interface 有关 类的详细信息，请参阅[数据集、数据表和 dataview](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/)。For more information about the class, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/). 您可以创建一个网格，使用户能够编辑数据，但通过使用 作为数据源并将 属性设置为 `false`，来防止用户添加新行。You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a as the data source and setting the property to `false`. 数据源由 对象进一步管理。Data sources are further managed by objects. 对于数据源中的每个表，可以从窗体的 返回 。For each table in a data source, a can be returned from the form's . 例如，您可以通过返回关联的 对象的 属性来确定数据源包含的行数。For example, you can determine the number of rows contained by a data source by returning the associated object's property. 若要验证数据，请使用表示数据及其事件的基础对象。To validate data, use the underlying objects that represent data and their events. 例如，如果数据来自 中的 ，请使用 和 事件。For example, if the data comes from a in a , use the and events. > [!NOTE] > 由于可以自定义列数（通过添加或删除 的成员）并按列对行进行排序，因此无法确保 和 属性值对应于 中的 和 索引。Because the number of columns can be customized (by adding or deleting members of the ) and the rows can be sorted by column, the and property values cannot be guaranteed to correspond to and indexes in a . 因此，应避免在 事件中使用这些属性来验证数据。Therefore you should avoid using those properties in the event to validate data. 若要确定选定的单元格，请使用 属性。To determine which cell is selected, use the property. 使用 "" 属性更改任意单元格的值，该属性可以采用单元格的行索引和列索引，也可以是单个 。Change the value of any cell by using the property, which can take either the row and column indexes of the cell, or a single . 监视 事件，以便在用户选择另一个单元格时进行检测。Monitor the event to detect when the user selects another cell. 若要确定用户单击的控件部分，请使用 事件中的 方法。To determine which part of the control the user clicked, use the method in the event. 方法返回一个 对象，该对象包含已单击区域的行和列。The method returns a object, which contains the row and column of a clicked area. 若要在运行时管理控件的外观，可以使用多个设置颜色和标题特性的属性，包括 、、等。To manage the appearance of the control at run time, several properties for setting the color and caption attributes are available, including the , , , and so on. 可以通过创建 对象并将其添加到 （通过 属性访问）来进一步修改所显示网格的外观。The appearance of the displayed grid (or grids) can be further modified by creating objects and adding them to the , which is accessed through the property. 例如，如果将 设置为包含三个 对象的 ，则可以向集合添加三个 对象，每个对象对应一个表。For example, if the is set to a containing three objects, you can add three objects to the collection, one for each table. 若要将每个 对象与 同步，请将 的 设置为 的 。To synchronize each object with a , set the of the to the of the . 有关绑定到对象数组的详细信息，请参阅 属性。For more information about binding to an array of objects, see the property. 若要创建表的自定义视图，请创建 或 类的实例，并将该对象添加到通过 属性访问的 。To create a customized view of a table, create an instance of a or class and add the object to the accessed through the property. 这两个类均从 继承。Both classes inherit from . 对于每个列样式，将 设置为要在网格中显示的列的 。For each column style, set the to the of a column that you want to show in the grid. 若要隐藏列，请将其 设置为有效 以外的内容。To hide a column, set its to something other than a valid . 若要设置列的文本格式，请将 的 属性设置为在[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings)中找到的值之一。To format the text of a column, set the property of the to one of the values found in [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings). 若要将 绑定到对象的强类型数组，对象类型必须包含公共属性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要创建显示数组的 ，请将 属性设置为 `typename[]`，其中 `typename` 替换为对象类型的名称。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename[]` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 另请注意， 属性区分大小写;类型名称必须完全匹配。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 请参阅 属性以获取示例。See the property for an example. 您还可以将 绑定到 。You can also bind the to an . 的一项功能是它可以包含多种类型的对象，但如果列表中的所有项的类型与第一个项的类型相同，则 只能绑定到此类列表。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 这意味着所有对象的类型必须相同，或者必须从列表中的第一项继承同一个类。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果列表中的第一项是 ，则第二项可以是 （从 继承）。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 另一方面，如果第一项是 ，则第二个对象不能为 。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，当绑定时， 必须具有其中的项。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound. 空 将导致空网格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 此外， 中的对象必须包含公共属性。In addition, the objects in the must contain public properties. 绑定到 时，将 的 设置为 "ArrayList" （类型名称）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). 对于每个 ，你可以设置颜色和标题特性来重写 控件的设置。For each , you can set color and caption attributes that override the settings for the control. 但是，如果未设置这些属性，则默认情况下使用控件的设置。However, if those properties are not set, the settings for the control are used by default. 属性可以重写以下属性：The following properties can be overridden by properties: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要自定义单个列的外观，请向 中添加 对象，该对象可通过每个 的 属性进行访问。To customize the appearance of individual columns, add objects to the , which is accessed through the property of each . 若要将每个 与 中的 同步，请将 设置为 的 。To synchronize each with a in the , set the to the of a . 构造 时，还可以设置一个指定列如何显示数据的格式设置字符串。When constructing a , you can also set a formatting string that specifies how the column displays data. 例如，可以指定列使用短日期格式来显示表中包含的日期。For example, you can specify that the column use a short-date format to display dates contained in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 在将 对象添加到 之前，始终创建 对象并将其添加到 中。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 将具有有效 值的空 添加到集合时，会自动为你生成 对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，如果尝试将具有重复 值的新 对象添加到 ，则会引发异常。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . > [!NOTE] > 控件取代了 控件并添加了功能；但是，可以选择保留 控件以实现向后兼容并供将来使用。The control replaces and adds functionality to the control; however, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件与 DataGrid 控件之间的区别](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls)。For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 Windows 窗体、一个包含两个 对象的 以及一个与这两个表关联的 。The following code example creates a Windows form, a containing two objects, and a that relates the two tables. 若要显示数据， 控件然后通过 方法绑定到 。To display the data, a control is then bound to the through the method. 窗体上的按钮通过创建两个 对象并将每个对象的 设置为 对象之一的 来更改网格的外观。A button on the form changes the appearance of the grid by creating two objects and setting the of each object to a of one of the objects. 该示例还包含 事件中的代码，该代码使用 方法来打印已单击的网格的列、行和部分。The example also contains code in the event that uses the method to print the column, row, and part of the grid that has been clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前对控件有效，则 属性将重写此属性。This property is overridden by the property if there is a currently in effect for the control. 如果允许排序，则单击列标题将按该列对表数据进行排序。If sorting is allowed, clicking on a column header will sort the table data by that column. 还可以使用表达式对 进行排序。You can also sort using an expression for a . 有关创建排序表达式的详细信息，请参阅 。See for details on creating a sort expression. 如果 绑定到 ，则可以使用 类的 属性为表设置自定义排序。If the is bound to a , you can set a custom sort for the table using the class's property. 同样，如果 绑定到 ，则 中的每个表都可以通过设置 类的 属性来进行自定义排序。Similarly, if the is bound to a , each table in the can have a custom sort by setting the class's property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将切换 属性。The following code example toggles the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定网格中的行颜色，而 确定 nonrow 区域的颜色，该区域仅在网格向下滚动时可见，或在网格中只包含几行时可见。Whereas the property determines the color of rows in the grid, the determines the color of the nonrow area, which is only visible when the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid. 默认情况下， 和 属性都设置为相同的颜色。By default, both the and the properties are set to the same color. 设置 属性仅影响偶数行，而设置 只会影响奇数行。Setting the property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the affects only odd-numbered rows. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 和 属性设置为不同的值。The following code example sets both the and properties to different values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 包含多个数据源，则应将 设置为源之一。If a contains multiple sources of data, you should set the to one of the sources. 例如，如果 是 或 ，其中包含三个名为 `Customers`、`Orders`和 `OrderDetails`的表，则必须指定要绑定到的表中的一个。For example, if the is a or that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify one of the tables to bind to. 如果 或 只包含一个 ，则应将 设置为该 的 。If the or contains only one , you should set the to the of that . 如果 设置为包含 对象的 ，则将在每个行标题中显示一个加号（+）的父表。If the is set to a that contains objects, parent tables will appear with a plus sign (+) in each row header. 单击加号会使节点出现，其中包含指向子表的链接。Clicking the plus sign causes a node to appear that contains links to child tables. 例如，如果 包含两个名为 `Customers` 和 `Orders`的 对象，则将 设置为 `Customers` 表将导致 显示一个父表，并在每个行标题上显示一个加号。For example, if a contains two objects named `Customers` and `Orders`, setting the to the `Customers` table causes the to display a parent table with a plus sign visible on each row header. 但是，如果 设置为 `Orders`，则行标题将为空。If the is set to `Orders`, however, the row headers will be blank. 如果 是 、、集合或数组，则设置 属性会引发异常。If the is a , , collection, or array, setting the property throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 在运行时，必须使用 方法重置 属性。At run time, you must use the method to reset the property. 但是，可以在任何时候将单独的 属性重置为有效的表名称。However, the property alone can be reset at any time to a valid table name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 控件的 和 属性。The following code example sets the and properties of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，使用 方法设置 和 属性。At run time, use the method to set the and properties. 以下数据源有效：The following data sources are valid: - 一个 类型的值A - 一个 类型的值A - 一个 类型的值A - 一个 类型的值A - 实现 接口的任何组件Any component that implements the interface - 实现 接口的任何组件Any component that implements the interface 有关数据源的详细信息，请参阅 类概述。See the class overview for more information on data sources. 如果 引用包含多个表，则必须将 属性设置为指定要绑定到的表的字符串。If the reference contains more than one table, you must set the property a string that specifies the table to bind to. 例如，如果 是 或 ，其中包含三个名为 `Customers`、`Orders`和 `OrderDetails`的表，则必须指定要绑定到的表。For example, if the is a or that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify the table to bind to. 将 设置为不实现 接口或 的对象将导致网格引发异常。Setting the to an object that does not implement the interface or an will cause the grid to throw an exception. 您可以创建一个网格，使用户能够编辑数据，但通过使用 作为数据源并将 属性设置为 `false`，来防止用户添加新行。You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a as the data source and setting the property to `false`. 若要将 绑定到对象的强类型数组，对象类型必须包含公共属性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要创建显示数组的 ，请将 属性设置为 `typename`，其中 `typename` 替换为对象类型的名称。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 另请注意， 属性区分大小写;类型名称必须完全匹配。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 请参阅 属性以获取示例。See the property for an example. 您还可以将 绑定到 。You can also bind the to an . 的一项功能是它可以包含多种类型的对象，但如果列表中的所有项的类型与第一个项的类型相同，则 只能绑定到此类列表。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 这意味着所有对象的类型必须相同，或者必须从列表中的第一项继承同一个类。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果列表中的第一项是 ，则第二项可以是 （从 继承）。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 另一方面，如果第一项是 ，则第二个对象不能为 。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，当绑定时， 必须具有其中的项。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound. 空 将导致空网格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 此外， 中的对象必须包含公共属性。In addition, the objects in the must contain public properties. 绑定到 时，将 的 设置为 "ArrayList" （类型名称）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 ，并在需要时设置 将 同时绑定到 和 。The following code example shows how to set the , and when needed, the , to bind a to both a and a . 该示例还演示如何从 返回数据源。The example also shows how to return data sources from the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在只读模式下，可以滚动网格，可以展开或折叠节点，等等。In read-only mode, the grid can be scrolled, nodes can be expanded or collapsed, and so on. 但是，不能进行添加、编辑或删除操作。However, no additions, edits, or deletes can take place. 还具有一个 属性，该属性可以设置为 true，以逐列方式禁止编辑数据。The also has a property that can be set to true to prevent data from being edited, on a column-by-column basis. 如果要禁止用户直接编辑 中的数据，则可以将 设置为 true。The can be set to true if you want to prohibit the user from editing the data directly in the . 例如，您可能希望允许用户查看表中的所有列，但只允许用户通过其他窗体上的 控件编辑特定字段。For example, you might want to let users to see all columns in a table, but allow them to edit specific fields only through controls on a different form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将切换 属性。The following code example toggles the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用通过 属性检索 来创建 控件所显示的每个表的自定义视图。Use the retrieved through the property to create customized views of each table displayed by the control. 默认情况下， 属性返回的集合不包含任何 对象。By default, the collection returned by property does not contain any objects. 创建一组自定义视图：To create a set of customized views: 1. 创建。Create a . 2. 将网格表对象的 设置为 的 。Set the of the grid table object to the of the . 3. 将 对象（每个要显示的网格列一个）添加到 属性返回的 中。Add objects, one for each grid column you want to show, to the returned by the property. 4. 将每个 的 设置为 的 。Set the of each to the of a . 5. 将 对象添加到 属性返回的集合中。Add the object to the collection returned by property. > [!CAUTION] > 在将 对象添加到 之前，始终创建 对象并将其添加到 中。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 将具有有效 值的空 添加到集合时，会自动为你生成 对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，如果尝试将具有重复 值的新 对象添加到 ，则会引发异常。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例为 中找到的每个 创建一个 ，并将 的 设置为 的 。The following code example creates one for each found in a , and sets the of the to the of the . 然后，将 添加到 属性返回的 中。The is then added to the returned by the property. 该示例还打印 中每个 的 属性返回的 中每个 的 。The example also prints the of each in the returned by the property of each in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 可见列的数目可能会根据其宽度而变化。The number of visible columns can change depending on their width. 例如，如果设置了 "所有列的默认宽度"，但新列的宽度设置为 "大" 两倍，则可见列的数目可以至少减少一列。For example, if a default width for all columns is set, but the width of a new column is set twice as large, the number of visible columns can be reduced by at least one. ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回可见列的数目。The following code example returns the number of visible columns.
